sentences.en: They suffered the heartbreak of losing a child through cancer.
sentences.cn: 他们因癌症夺去了一个孩子而肝肠寸断。

sentences.en: I wore sunglasses and played Heartbreak Hotel and God Bless the Child on my sax.
sentences.cn: 我戴着太阳镜，用萨克斯管吹奏《伤心旅馆》和《上帝保佑孩子》。

sentences.en: Of course there are thousands more stories of heartbreak.
sentences.cn: 当然还有成千上万令人心碎的故事。
